document.heading: Combined Condominium Real Property Tax Amendment Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-150, the “Combined Condominium Real Property Tax Amendment Act of 2012”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-188, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 17, 2012, and May 1, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 11, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-356 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-150 became effective on July 13, 2012.
